# speechRecognitionTaskWasCancelled(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the task has been canceled.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func speechRecognitionTaskWasCancelled(_ task: SFSpeechRecognitionTask)
```

## Parameters

- **task**: The speech recognition task (an [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SFSpeechRecognitionTask] object) that represents the request.

## Discussion

A speech recognition task can be canceled by the user, by your app, or by the system.

## Finishing a speech recognition task

- **speechRecognitionTask(_:didFinishRecognition:)**: Tells the delegate when the final utterance is recognized.
- **speechRecognitionTask(_:didFinishSuccessfully:)**: Tells the delegate when the recognition of all requested utterances is finished.
- **speechRecognitionTask(_:didProcessAudioDuration:)**: Tells the delegate how much audio has been processed by the task.
